Class model.AbstractMovable

java.lang.Object
model.AbstractMovable
All Implemented Interfaces:
model.Movable
Direct Known Subclasses:
model.Vehicle
public abstract class model.AbstractMovable extends Object implements model.Movable
model.AbstractMovable collects and handles all information about position and movement. Also contains the necessary methods for changing this information by applying these methods. Implements the interface model.Movable
